title: Auth migration — session management refactor
description: Refactor session management to support the new auth flow. Includes multi-device session handling and token rotation.
notes: Code complete but Redis cluster wasn't provisioned until late Thursday. Only 2 hours of testing done — not fully validated.

title: Add rate limiting to public API
description: Implement sliding window rate limiting for public API endpoints. 100 req/min for free tier, 1000 for paid.

title: Fix timezone bug in scheduler
description: Recurring events use local time instead of UTC, causing wrong trigger times for users in different timezones.

title: Update error messages for auth flow
description: Replace generic 'Auth failed' with specific, actionable error messages.

title: Dashboard data layer refactor
description: Move dashboard data fetching to the new service pattern. Prep for GraphQL migration.
notes: PR #342 merged Thursday after Alex's review.

title: Redis cluster provisioning for auth
description: Provision Redis cluster (managed or self-hosted) for session storage in the new auth flow.
notes: Provisioned Thursday after arch review. Managed option selected ($400/mo).

title: Dashboard V2 — design mockups
description: Create 3 layout options for the new analytics dashboard view.
notes: Design review completed. Option B selected (data-dense).

title: Investigate caching layer race condition
description: The /api/v2/analytics incident revealed a race condition in the caching layer. Needs investigation and potentially a rewrite.
notes: Marcus spent 6-8 hours on incident response Wed night + postmortem Thu. Investigation started but not complete.

title: Write incident postmortem — analytics error spike
description: Document root cause, impact, fix, and preventive measures for the Feb 5 /api/v2/analytics incident.
notes: Postmortem published Thursday. 847 users affected, ~3 hours.

title: GraphQL prototype for dashboard API
description: Build a small proof-of-concept using GraphQL for the analytics query endpoint.
notes: James started this without PM approval. Basic query endpoint working. Not in original sprint plan.
